"Wheelchair bound" - A wheelchair user who is not only physically limited but also emotionally and mentally trapped in their situation.
"Wheelchair freedom" - A person who has overcome the limitations of a wheelchair and achieved freedom and independence.
"Wheelchair warrior" - A person who has overcome significant physical challenges while using a wheelchair and has become a symbol of strength and resilience.
"Wheelchair adventure" - A person who uses their wheelchair as a tool to explore new places and experiences, challenging the perception of what is possible with a disability.
"Wheelchair transformation" - A person who has undergone a physical and emotional transformation as a result of using a wheelchair, becoming stronger and more confident in their abilities.
